screen_desc: The screenshot displays the "Settings" menu of a mobile device, focusing on keyboard or input settings. It includes options like language selection, preferences, theme, text correction, glide typing, voice typing, dictionary, and search. The current language is set to "English (US)" with the QWERTY layout. The user can customize various typing-related features.
history_actions: click on the Settings icon located at the upper left.
click on the "System" option located at the middle-lower part of the screen.
click on the "Languages & input" located at the upper left.
click on the "Virtual keyboard" settings located at the left and upper middle part of the screen.
click on the "Gboard Multilingual typing" option located at the upper left side of the screen.

think_action.Thought: The user wants to change the keyboard's appearance, which typically involves modifying the theme or other visual settings of the keyboard. The 'Theme' option is visible in the current settings, which is likely the right place to adjust the keyboard's looks. I will need to navigate to the 'Theme' settings and explore options for customizing the keyboard's appearance.
Future Action Plan: Select a new theme or appearance for the keyboard
